description: This module is responsible for configuring the NGCHM (Next Generation Clustered Heat Map) API. It sets up various configuration parameters such as the API location, custom script location, and the default GUI builder URL.

member_variables.name: api
member_variables.description: Location at which NGCHM server can be contacted. If non-empty, must end with a /.

member_variables.name: custom_specified
member_variables.description: Indicates if the location of custom.js is specified explicitly.

member_variables.name: custom_script
member_variables.description: Location of script for defining custom link outs etc.

member_variables.name: builder_url
member_variables.description: Location of default NG-CHM GUI builder.

global_variables.name: defaultBuilderURL
global_variables.description: Default URL for the NGCHM web builder.
